column2: McCormick & Co., Inc. engages in the manufacture, market and distribution of spices, seasoning mixes, condiments and other flavorful products to retail outlets, food manufacturers and foodservice businesses. The company is headquartered in Sparks, Maryland and currently employs 11,600 full-time employees. The firm's segments include consumer and industrial. The firm is involved in the manufacturing and sales of flavorful products. As of November 30, 2016, it offered brands for consumers in approximately 150 countries and territories. The firm's brands in the Americas include McCormick, Lawry's, and Club House, as well as brands, such as Gourmet Garden and OLD BAY. The company provides a range of products to food manufacturers and foodservice customers. The firm's sales, distribution and production facilities are located in North America, Europe and China. The company markets regional and ethnic brands, such as Zatarain's, Stubb's, Thai Kitchen and Simply Asia. The firm offers sensory testing, culinary research, food safety and flavor application.
